0.text: Innate:  Kayn wields an ancient, sentient weapon, that battles with him for control. Enemy champions drop orbs for each instance of damage (excluding damage over time) they receive from Kayn and everytime he scores a  takedown against them.  Melee champions drop red orbs and  ranged champions drop blue orbs. Red orbs grant progress towards  Rhaast while blue orbs do so for the  Shadow Assassin. Orbs will remain on the ground until automatically collected by Kayn regardless of range once he leaves combat, filling a bar above his portrait.

1.text: Once the bar is filled, Kayn can return to the summoning platform to interact with his portrait to either be overwhelmed by  Rhaast or expel him to become the  Shadow Assassin, or wait 4 minutes until the other form becomes available, reduced by 5 seconds for each collected orb of their type after that. After selecting a form, Kayn transforms over 6 seconds, during which he is  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act. Kayn cannot choose a form if he is unable to cast abilities.

2.text: The transformation type is decided based on the highest amount of damage dealt to the respective range type. If the two forms are within 8% of each other, the last champion range type hit will determine the transformation. If both types are hit at the same time the trasformation will default to  Rhaast. The transformation will permanently empower some of Kayn's abilities and grant him Homeguard for the first time.

3.text: Shadow Assassin: If Kayn has been out of combat with enemy champions for over 8 seconds, or he casts  Umbral Trespass, he deals 12% − 44% (based on level) of post-mitigation damage dealt against enemy champions as  bonus magic damage, lasting for 3 seconds upon entering combat and also applying on the first instance of damage dealt. If this effect is ready, it will not go on cooldown by receiving damage.

4.text: Darkin: Rhaast  heals for 30% − 40% (based on level) of the post-mitigation  physical damage that he deals to enemy champions with his abilities.

0.text: Active: Kayn  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through, before swinging his scythe, dealing the same damage to surrounding enemies.

1.text: Both instances of Reaping Slash deal 40 bonus damage against  minions and  monsters.

2.text: Darkin: Reaping Slash's damage is modified to deal 65% AD (+ 5% (+ 4% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's maximum health) physical damage for both instances. This damage is capped against monsters but does not include the bonus damage.

3.text: Reaping Slash's dash speed scales with Kayn's  total movement speed.

0.text: Active: Kayn performs an upwards sweep with his scythe in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies within a line and  slowing them by 90% decaying over 1.5 seconds.

1.text: Shadow Assassin: Blade's Reach's range is increased by 200. Additionally, Kayn conjures an  untargetable living shadow at the casting position to perform Blade's Reach's sweep over 0.55 seconds in his stead, reducing the ability's cast time to 0.

2.text: Darkin: Blade's Reach also  knocks up enemies hit for 1 second.

0.text: Active: Kayn gains  40% bonus movement speed,  ghosting and the ability to ignore terrain collision for a duration. If Kayn has been in combat with enemy champions within the last 3 seconds, Shadow Step will instead last 1.5 seconds.

1.text: Kayn  heals himself upon moving through terrain for the first time from casting Shadow Step and he gains  unobstructed vision while inside.

2.text: Receiving damage from or dealing damage to an enemy  champion while Shadow Step is active reduces its remaining duration to 1.5 seconds. This effect also cannot remain active out of terrain for longer than 1.5 seconds and will cancel immediately if Kayn performs a basic attack or becomes  immobilized or  polymorphed.

3.text: Shadow Assassin: Shadow Step's  cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds at all ranks. Additionally, Kayn gains 100%  slow resist and, upon entering terrain, the bonus movement speed is increased to 80% for the remaining duration.

0.text: Passive: Kayn marks enemy champions he damaged in the last 3.15 seconds.

1.text: Active: Kayn  vanishes and  dashes to a marked enemy  champion. Upon arrival, he  channels for up to 2.5 seconds,  attaching to the target and  revealing them. Umbral Trespass can be recast after 0.75 seconds during the channel, and does so automatically if the channel ends without reactivation or is  interrupted.

2.text: Recast: After a 0.75-second delay, Kayn deals physical damage to the target and  dashes out from their body in the target direction while still being  untargetable.

3.text: Shadow Assassin: Umbral Trespass gains up to 200 bonus cast range and emerge range. Additionally, emerging will reset  The Darkin Scythe's  cooldown.

4.text: Darkin: Umbral Trespass is modified to deal 10% (+ 13% per 100 bonus AD) of the target's  maximum health physical damage, and  heals him for 7% (+ 9.1% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health.

1.concerningText: Active: Kayn  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through, before swinging his scythe, dealing the same damage to surrounding enemies.

2.concerningText: Active: Kayn performs an upwards sweep with his scythe in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies within a line and  slowing them by 90% decaying over 1.5 seconds.

3.concerningText: Active: Kayn gains  40% bonus movement speed,  ghosting and the ability to ignore terrain collision for a duration. If Kayn has been in combat with enemy champions within the last 3 seconds, Shadow Step will instead last 1.5 seconds.
Kayn  heals himself upon moving through terrain for the first time from casting Shadow Step and he gains  unobstructed vision while inside.

4.concerningText: Recast: After a 0.75-second delay, Kayn deals physical damage to the target and  dashes out from their body in the target direction while still being  untargetable.

0.concerningText: Active: Kayn  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through, before swinging his scythe, dealing the same damage to surrounding enemies.

1.originHTML: +  650

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Chilling Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Chilling Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all item effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jungle

Unique – Thirsting Slash: Deal 100% AD physical damage to enemies in a 450 radius around you. Heal for 25% AD (+ 10% of your missing health) for each enemy champion hit (15 (reduced by ability haste) second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – THIRSTING SLASH: Deal 100% AD physical damage to enemies in a  450 radius around you.  Heal for 25% AD (+ 10% of your missing health) for each enemy champion hit (15 (reduced by ability haste) second cooldown).

Passive

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack reduces the target's armor by 5%, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
Unique – Rage: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion grants 3 bonus movement speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds, up to 18.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CARVE: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack reduces the target's armor by 5%, up to 30% at 6 stacks.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+50 attack damage
+400 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bloodlust: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for ( 2% / 1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% / 3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 100 damage for 4 seconds, increased by ( 8% / 4.8%) maximum health per stack of Bloodlust, up to an increase of ( 40% / 24%) maximum health at 5 Bloodlust stacks (60 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BLOODLUST: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion,  heal for ( 2% /  1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% /  3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
